heading_path: Chapter 2 Liability Description A. Retirement responsibilities Annual survival benefits pay 35% of base sumassured; quick-return option refunds from year three with smoothing bonus linked to asset pool results.
text: Chapter 2 Liability Description A. Retirement responsibilities Annual survival benefits pay 35% of base sumassured; quick-return option refunds from year three with smoothing bonus linked to asset pool results.

heading_path: Chapter 2 Liability Description A. Retirement responsibilities Annual survival benefits pay 35% of base sumassured; quick-return option refunds from year three with smoothing bonus linked to asset pool results. > 1. War or nuclear events are excluded; B. Exclusions
text: 1. War or nuclear events are excluded; B. Exclusions

heading_path: Chapter 2 Liability Description A. Retirement responsibilities Annual survival benefits pay 35% of base sumassured; quick-return option refunds from year three with smoothing bonus linked to asset pool results. > 2. Intentional self-injury or criminal acts void benefits. (1) Policy document; (2) Identity proof; (3) C. Claim materials Medical diagnosis; (4) Receipts.
text: 2. Intentional self-injury or criminal acts void benefits. (1) Policy document; (2) Identity proof; (3) C. Claim materials Medical diagnosis; (4) Receipts.
